Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStateSubscriber, ListenerSubscriber, RemoteLobbyController, Serializable, Remote
public class LobbyController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteLobbyController, GameStateSubscriber
the lobby controller ensures the communication through client controller and server model

  • Method Details

    • enterInLobby

      public RemoteGameController enterInLobby(String player) throws RemoteException, NicknameAlreadyUsedException, InvalidPlayerException
      make it possible for the player to join the lobby e select a game
      Specified by:
      enterInLobby in interface RemoteLobbyController
      Parameters:
      player - the username of the player to be added
      Returns:
      a RemoteGameController, if the player was crashed, null if the player is correctly logged in the lobby
      Throws:
      NicknameAlreadyUsedException - if the player is already inside a game
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
      InvalidPlayerException - the username used is invalid

    • addPlayerToGame

      public RemoteGameController addPlayerToGame(String player) throws RemoteException, NicknameAlreadyUsedException, NoAvailableGameException, InvalidPlayerException
      add a logged player to a game
      Specified by:
      addPlayerToGame in interface RemoteLobbyController
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player to be added
      Returns:
      remote game controller instance reference
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
      NicknameAlreadyUsedException - the nickname used by the player is already taken
      NoAvailableGameException - no game is available
      InvalidPlayerException - the nickname is invalid

    • createGame

      public RemoteGameController createGame(String player, int nPlayers) throws RemoteException, InvalidPlayerException, PlayersNumberOutOfRange
      creates a game for a certain number of player
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface RemoteLobbyController
      Parameters:
      player - the username of the player
      nPlayers - the number of players for the game
      Returns:
      the GameController, if the game creation is not possible, an empty value will be returned
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
      InvalidPlayerException - the nickname is invalid
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - the number of player is not valid ( less than 2 or greater than 4 )

    • handleCrashedPlayer

      public void handleCrashedPlayer(String username) throws PlayerNotFoundException, RemoteException
      used to handle the crash of the player, it removes the player from the waiting list
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the player doesn't exist in the lobby
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

    • triggerHeartBeat

      public void triggerHeartBeat(String username) throws RemoteException
      method used in RMI for triggering the heartbeat of the client, if a client doesn't trigger this method for a too long period, the client will be considered crashed
      Specified by:
      triggerHeartBeat in interface RemoteLobbyController
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
